text: The 1972 Atlantic hurricane season began on June 1, 1972 and ended on November 30, 1972. 1972 had a very inactive hurricane season with only 7 storms all were named this was one of the seasons that subtropical storms had a separate naming list. One of the only notable storms this season Hurricane Agnes which at that time it was the costliest hurricane in US history. ==Storms== *Subtropical Storm Alpha *Hurricane Agnes *Hurricane Betty *Tropical Storm Carrie *Hurricane Dawn *Subtropical Storm Charlie *Subtropical Storm Delta ==Storm names== This is the list of names that were set aside for the 1972 Atlantic hurricane season. Name that were not used are marked in * Hurricane Agnes * Hurricane Betty * Tropical Storm Carrie * Hurricane Dawn * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Unused Subtropical Storm names== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Retirement== Agnes was retired in 1973. ==Other websites== * HPC rainfall pages for 1972 Tropical Cyclones * Monthly Weather Review
title: 1972 Atlantic hurricane season
